data.title: Jesus von Montreal (Jesus de Montreal)
data.meta_description: Chisholm Larsson Gallery has over 60,000 Original Vintage Posters, spanning all genres.
data.text: 1989 film about a group of actors in Montreal who perform a Passion play in a Quebec church. It won the Jury Prize at the 1989 Cannes Film Festival and was nominated for an Academy Award for best foreign film (wiki).
